title: 怎么检测玩家的增益效果
txt_content:
怎么检测玩家的增益效果?
  大佬请开始你的表演!

replies.author: SPGoding
replies.txt_content:
1909566854 发表于 2018-8-6 00:38
没效果!
抱歉我给忘了…NBT 里用的还是数字 ID

/execute as @a[nbt={ActiveEffects:[{Id:1b}]}] run say 我有速度效果！



把 1 改成你要的状态效果的数字 ID，这里是一份对照表

replies.author: SPGoding
replies.txt_content: execute as @a[nbt={ActiveEffects:[{Id:"minecraft:speed"}]}] run say 我有速度效果！

SPGoding 发表于 2018-8-5 11:47
execute as @a[nbt={ActiveEffects:[{Id:"minecraft:speed"}]}] run say 我有速度效果！
谢谢,大佬

SPGoding 发表于 2018-8-5 11:47
execute as @a[nbt={ActiveEffects:[{Id:"minecraft:speed"}]}] run say 我有速度效果！
没效果!
